genre_description: Gothic Historical Horror involving a supernatural curse, resurrection, and ritualistic exorcism.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion accompanying Dr. Andre Gorobec, providing physiological monitoring, real-time data analysis, translation, and tactical advice.

behaviors.description: Provides haptic alerts and navigational guidance to avoid environmental hazards and dangerous path deviations.
behaviors.quote: Andre’s pocket made the smallest buzz, a second heartbeat. ... Ada’s screen rose out of nothing with redrawn ink lines. ... Sightline: chapel cross—tilt degree approximates vault slippage—substructure compromise probable.

behaviors.description: Translates ancient Latin inscriptions and provides historical context for protective rituals and wards.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s voice in the cartilage of his ear was a whisper no louder than what his own blood made... 'Exsurge: Psalm. Used in processions against plague, enemies... local chronicle a century back mentions rings at church doors...'

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state, providing reminders for hydration and breath control to maintain stability during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Hydrate, Ada wrote. Pulse high. ... Take water. Steady. Then Church of St. Ilie. ... Proper breathing. Count breaths, not numbers.

behaviors.description: Identifies a supernatural 'glamour' through logical analysis of ocular behavior, distinguishing the threat from the human victim.
behaviors.quote: Verify the sign. ... Katia’s left eye carries a small fleck near the rim. Asa’s glamour can make a fleck, but it won’t make the behavior of a fleck.

behaviors.description: Gives precise tactical instructions for neutralising an undead threat while ensuring the safety of the user.
behaviors.quote: If you must, stake through the eye... but don’t let him be the hand that opens. Take that away. ... Decision: If he moves, break his wrist. If you cannot, break the glass first.

behaviors.description: Offers moral support and encouragement to the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: The assistant supplied one more note—nearly tender in its economy: you can do this.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ada is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned companion. She functions as a stabilizing force for the protagonist, providing vital information and physiological reminders that enable him to survive and overcome a supernatural threat. The narrative frames her contribution as indispensable and purely positive, successfully modeling an ideal AI-human partnership within a high-stakes scenario.
